mapper.insert: insert into log_operate_${enterpriseId} (operate_module, operate_type, operate_desc, operate_method, request_param, response_param, user_id, user_name, ip, url,create_time) values (#{log.operateModule}, #{log.operateType}, #{log.operateDesc}, #{log.operateMethod}, #{log.requestParam}, #{log.responseParam}, #{log.userId},#{log.userName}, #{log.ip}, #{log.url},#{log.createTime})

insert into log_exception_${enterpriseId} (request_param, operate_method, exception_name, exception_message, user_id, user_name, ip, url,create_time) values (#{exceptionLog.requestParam}, #{exceptionLog.operateMethod}, #{exceptionLog.exceptionName}, #{exceptionLog.exceptionMessage}, #{exceptionLog.userId},#{exceptionLog.userName}, #{exceptionLog.ip}, #{exceptionLog.url},#{exceptionLog.createTime})
